projects.name: Spartan Drive
projects.description: A file sharing app native to Android created using AWS S3 & Parse push on Android SDK 4.4 and above

projects.name: State Based Crdt
projects.description: A state based CRDT to demonstrate working of a counter in a Eventually Consistent system designed for AP in the CAP theorem.

projects.name: GRPC Pollling Service
projects.description: A small project with GoogleRPC framework and Protocol buffers used for serialisation and deserialisation.

projects.name: Facebook TimeMachine
projects.description: Facebook Time Machine - Imports media and related metadata from facebook to store it separately on private cloud

projects.name: MOOC Distributed System
projects.description: A fault tolerant, consistent and scalable distributed System based on Raft.

projects.name: Arkanoid
projects.description: An arkanoid game in Unity2D, following Scrum Agile Development Model and using design patterns like Observer, Factory, Decorator, Command, Strategy.

projects.name: YouTube Clone - myTube
projects.description: A Youtube clone to demonstrate Youtube Player Api and google Api for Oauth

projects.name: Distributed Graph Processing
projects.description: A distributed graph processing framework for next-gen IoT devices
